gridsim.resFailure
Class AvailabilityInfo

Object
  AvailabilityInfo

public class AvailabilityInfo
extends Object

This class is used by GridSim users to check whether a particular resource is working or is totally failed.

Since:
GridSim Toolkit 4.1
Author:
Agustin Caminero
